statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 9 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -9 \\ -15 \\ -9 \\ 15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ 20 \\ 42 \\ -6 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
